title: Wood
description:
One or two stumps of wood, cut so the rings are showing. Can be used to talk about wood or building materials. 

Also used in idioms with wood like knock on wood or out of the woods. Used to caption dic pics, often alongside the expression morning wood. Sometimes used in the context of games like Catan or Minecraft, where wood is a resource.
apple_vendor_description: The 'wood' emoji on Apple devices presents a warm, inviting texture, appearing as a polished slice of natural timber with distinct grain patterns. Its realistic lighting and subtle highlights emphasize the organic feel, while Apple's characteristic soft rounded edges make it look smooth and tactile. This emoji is frequently used in digital communication to represent nature, building materials, or a rustic aesthetic, bringing a grounded and earthy feel to messages.
